title: Carnival of Fear
description: The curator of the most terrifying carnival on earth, cordially invites you to enter his world… The games and attractions lurking within will soon find you lost in a maze with no end. Have your fortune told by Madame Mort, or slurp some of the world-famous 'Troll Grog' as you ride the 'Log Flume of Doom'. The Baron wants you to be a part of his creation, and the price of admission, is simply… your soul. Step right up, and enter… The Carnival of Fear!Will you ever leave?
author: Christopher Mark Stokes
